description.narrative: The proposed Project's development objectives are to assist the Recipient to: (i) provide needed infrastructure to improve access to basic public services; and (ii) create short term employment.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Para 1(b), Section IVB, Schedule 2 | Description :No withdrawal under Category (1): unless a Site-specific EMPhas been prepared for the particular site for which the withdrawal application is submitted. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Para 1, Section IC, Schedule 2 . | Description :The Recipient shall prepare, prior to the commencement of civilworks, and then implement Site-specific EMPs in accordance with theEIA (including the EMP). | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Para 1, Section IC, Schedule 2. | Description :The Recipient shall carry out the Project in accordance with theEIA (including the EMP), and the Site-specific EMPs. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Para 3, Section IC, Schedule 2 | Description :The Recipient shall carry out Sub-projects in accordance with theprovisions of para. 3 of Section IC, Schedule 2 to the Agreement. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Para 5, Section IA, Schedule 2 | Description :Before November 1 of each year, commencing November 1, 2012, theRecipient shall furnish to the Association, for its review and comments, an annual investment plan containing the information setout in Schedule 2 of the Agreement. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Para 6, Section IA, Schedule 2 | Description :The Recipient shall ensure adequate annual budgetary allocationsare made prior to cover counterpart funding required for Subprojects to be and deposit such funds into a separate bank account asset out in Schedule 2 of this Agreement. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Para 7, Section IA, Schedule 2 | Description :Not later than three months after the Effective Date, theRecipient shall appoint an independent external auditor based on terms ofreference acceptable to the Association. | Due Date:15-Sep-2012

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, para C 1 | Description :The Recipient shall carry out the Project in accordance with therequirements and operational procedures set forth in the ESMF and the Site-specific EMPs and shall not assign, amend, abrogate orwaive any provisions of the ESMF, and EMPs), or the Site-specific EMPs without prior approval of the Association. | Frequency:CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, para C 2 | Description :The Recipient shall (a) prepare, prior to the commencement of anycivil works under the Project, a Site-specific EMP, satisfactory to the Association, in accordance with the ESMF; (b) implement theSite-specific EMPs in accordance with the ESMF; (c) not amend, suspend or abrogate any of the provisions of the Site-specific EMPwithout the prior agreement of the Association. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, para C 3 | Description :The Recipient shall carry out Sub-projects in accordance with theprovisions of para. 3 of Section I C, Schedule 2 to the Agreement. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section IV, para B 1 (b) | Description :No withdrawal under Category (1): unless a Site-specific EMPhas been prepared for the particular site for which the withdrawal application is submitted. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, section I, paragraph A 5 | Description :Before Nov. 1 of each year, commencing Nov. 1, 2014, theRecipient shall furnish to the Association, for its review and comments, an Annual Investment Plan including an estimate of (i)operational costs of the PMU for the subsequent year; and (ii) the counterpartfunding required to be provided by the Recipient outof its own resources for Sub-projects to be carried out during the subsequent year. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, section I, paragraph A 6 | Description :The Recipient shall: (i) ensure that adequate annualbudgetary allocations are made prior to January 1 of each year to cover the counterpart funding required for Sub-projects to beimplemented during such year; and (ii) deposit each quarter into a separate bank account the counterpart funds identified in theinterim unaudited financial reports referred to in Section II B. 2 of Schedule 2 | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, section I, paragraph A7 | Description :Not later than three months after the Effective Date, theRecipient shall appoint an independent external auditor based on terms ofreference acceptable to the Association. | Due Date:31-Dec-2014

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, section II, paragraph B 2 | Description :The Recipient shall prepare and furnish to the Associationnot later than forty five (45) days after the end of each calendar quarter, interim unaudited financial reports for the Projectcovering the quarter, in form and substance satisfactory to the Association. | Frequency :Quarterly
